title: Number of earthquakes in Italy 2018 - 2019 , by magnitude

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Magnitude in the x axis and Number of earthquakes in the y axis.
Magnitude Magnitude 0+ has the highest Number of earthquakes and Magnitude 5.5+ has the lowest Number of earthquakes.
The second highest Number of earthquakes is appeared to be the Magnitude Magnitude 2+.

The Magnitude Magnitude 0+ tends to be 4.46 percent higher than average.
